00033 #include "BOP_Vertex.h"
00034 
00041 BOP_Vertex::BOP_Vertex(double x, double y, double z) 
00042 {
00043     m_point.setValue(x,y,z);
00044     m_tag = UNCLASSIFIED;   
00045 }
00046 
00051 BOP_Vertex::BOP_Vertex(MT_Point3 p) 
00052 {
00053     m_point = p;
00054     m_tag = UNCLASSIFIED;   
00055 }
00056 
00061 void BOP_Vertex::addEdge(BOP_Index i) 
00062 {
00063   if (!containsEdge(i))
00064     m_edges.push_back(i);
00065 }
00066 
00071 void BOP_Vertex::removeEdge(BOP_Index i) 
00072 {
00073     for(BOP_IT_Indexs it = m_edges.begin();it!=m_edges.end();it++) {
00074         if ((*it)==i) {
00075             m_edges.erase(it);
00076             return;
00077         }
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00086 bool BOP_Vertex::containsEdge(BOP_Index i)
00087 {
00088     int pos=0;
00089     for(BOP_IT_Indexs it = m_edges.begin();it!=m_edges.end();pos++,it++) {
00090       if ((*it)==i){
00091         return true;
00092       }
00093     }
00094     
00095     return false;
00096 }

00098 #ifdef BOP_DEBUG
00099 
00102 #include <iomanip>
00103 
00104 ostream &operator<<(ostream &stream, BOP_Vertex *v)
00105 {
00106     char aux[20];
00107     BOP_stringTAG(v->m_tag,aux);
00108     MT_Point3 point = v->getPoint();
00109     stream << setprecision(6) << showpoint << fixed;
00110     stream << "Vertex[" << point[0] << "," << point[1] << ",";
00111     stream << point[2] << "] ("  <<  aux  <<  ")";
00112     return stream;
00113 }
00114 #endif
